column3: Implemented the mhGAP Intervention Guide in 3 provinces.
Regulations in place on the importation and places of sale.
Revised and launched a new alcohol strategy and action plan.
Revised training on alcohol use and alcohol use disorders for health professionals.
Made major changes in the monitoring system.
Developed an inter-ministerial substance use response strategy 2016-2021 and action plan, with alcohol among the substances covered.
Planned a the national strategy to combat addictions in the 4th quarter of 2016, with the support of the Global Fund.

Commenced standardization of the current national information system. In particular, the national addictions programme is currently working on the standardization and computerization of materials relating to the management of addictions in specialized structures, as well as management protocols (an ongoing project , with the support of the Global Fund and the Catalan Agency of Public Health).
Improved the surveillance system for alcohol and other psychoactive substances.
Currently there is no policy implemented on alcohol abuse but it is included in a plan for 2017. The policy will be developed at the national level.
Trained non-specialist health professionals at PHC to diagnose and treat alcohol-related problems, and community workers on how to provide basic support and refer problem drinkers to specialists.
